chunk:
The Ordinary EUK 134 0.1% (2019 formulation)

Brand: The Ordinary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Propanediol, Ethylbisiminomethylguaiacol manganese chloride.

Directions: Apply alone or after water-based serums, before oils or heavier creams. Alternatively, mix with other treatments to enhance their antioxidant capacity signi

idant capacity significantly. Do not use with highly acidic formulations such as suspensions of ascorbic acid. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Refer to our in-depth guide to patch testing.

Warnings: Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredient conc

en.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
